issue.title: Create Repo in Organization

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: Is there a way to create a repository inside an organization?

body:
The job [#1503](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1503) assigned to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil), here is [why](https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/20a955b8-9029-4ca9-a101-b734de8df4c7); the budget is 30 minutes, see [§4](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#4); please, read [§8](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#8) and [§9](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#9); if the task is not clear, read [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/02/16/it-is-not-a-school.html) and [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/01/15/how-to-cut-corners.html); there will be no monetary reward for this job

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/b6b976c3-11e3-4dc1-83c7-104fe336d59c, version: 0.50.38, hash: ${buildNumber} -->

Job `gh:jcabi/jcabi-github#1503` already assigned to @amihaiemil, can't assign to @amihaiemil

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/0bb22cfd-bcb7-4419-89cd-bc49eb53f98e, version: 0.50.38, hash: ${buildNumber} -->

Manual assignment of issues is discouraged, see [§19](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#19): -5 point(s) just awarded to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil)

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/9234469c-b664-4123-898a-ab5cbab170a8, version: 0.50.38, hash: ${buildNumber} -->

Bug was reported, see [§29](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#29): +15 point(s) just awarded to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil)

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/949a4505-fa94-44e0-9238-a201546a7690, version: 0.50.38, hash: ${buildNumber} -->

It is strongly discouraged to assign jobs to their creators, see [§19](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#19): -15 point(s) just awarded to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil)

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/ca847925-f4e6-4801-b8d1-71cfabbc1aad, version: 0.50.38, hash: ${buildNumber} -->
